EmailTemplate.description: Used to alert that loan's maturity date has passed
EmailTemplate.name: ET23 - Loan Maturity Date has Passed
EmailTemplate.subject: *** Loan Maturity Date Has Has Passed - "{!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Name}" ***
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Organization.Name}Team Member,
{!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Name}'s maturity date has passed. The loan matured on {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.LLC_BI__Maturity_Date__c}.
Please login at your earliest convenience to see if any further actions are necessary.
To view more information about the loan: {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Link}
nCino
ET23
